admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Vocational Schools
            Development Project are to assist in upgrading the skill
            training provided in selected vocational high schools and to
            enhance the effectiveness of vocational education.  The
            project will include specialized equipment to be financed by
            the Bank for technical, commercial and agricultural
            vocational high schools.  The government will finance
            complementary inputs related to making the equipment
            operational and maintaining it thereafter, namely local
            transportation and installation costs, operation and
            maintenance and consumables.  The project will also include
            policy studies to be financed by the government, which will
            address problem areas in vocational education and make
            appropriate recommendations for their solution.
